title: Can't Log In
body:
My friend can't log into client, he triend reinstalling it 3 times and the same error still occurred. He then tried on his laptop and it was stil the same, so we guess its something about internet, but we have the same provider and its working fine for me. He tried everything thats on Riot Games SUpport  Youtube Channel, and the problem is still here.

This is message he is geting on New Client:"**An unexpected error occurred while logging in. Please try again. If this issue persist contact support at support.riotgames.com**"

P.S.   He sent ticket 29 hours ago and still no response

replies.body: My friend and I are experiencing the same thing.

************FIXED*******

He restarted router and it works, i dont know how. Try it!

Glad to see you two were able to get it figured out! If you run into this again, it might have been caused by some funky router settings, which might be fixed with our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).
I have the same problem with the new client, the log in screen is just a dark blue tab with nothing on it...{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

Same in NA here... I just tried to switch to the legacy client, and it seems to be downloading a patch. (So either the legacy updates are completely separate from the new clients updates, or perhaps some people are having issues getting the new patch, and its causing that error.)
